title: Ticket #7148: do not default to late materialization for single proc submissions
description: DESY tried to turn late materialization on by default using the SUBMIT_FACTORY_JOBS_BY_DEFAULT knob, and ran into problems with dagman. As a workaround, and because it's just more efficient. we should have this knob mean "default to late materialization only for submits that have more than 1 proc"
remarks: no version history because this is late materialization
check_ins: 2019-Jul-11 15:48   Check-in [57402]: for #7148, change condor_submit so that SUBMIT_FACTORY_JOBS_BY_DEFAULT does not do late materialization unless there is a queue statement with > 1 or there more than a single item of itemdata ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
